meanings.sent1: The roupiest chicken in the coop looked quite sick.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the roupiest bird and warned us not to touch it.
meanings.sent3: The roupiest hen tried to hide its sneezes with a little dance.
meanings.sent4: The roupiest rooster stood out like a sore thumb among the healthy flock.
meanings.sent5: The roupiest feathers on the sickly bird were a dull, matted mess.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the sick chickens, that one looked the roupiest.
meanings.sent2: The roupiest hen was still healthier than the others in the flock.
meanings.sent3: The roupiest bird seemed to be leading the others in a strange parade.
meanings.sent4: Her cough was the roupiest of them all, echoing through the coop.
meanings.sent5: The roupiest smell came from the corner where the unwell chickens huddled.
